channel.title: All Pardon votes changed to Abstain
channel.description:
#### What happened? we put somebody up because he claimed physician but couldn't be. he explained he meant to write psy (psychic) everybody confirmed his logs and we all mostly pardoned except for one guy. But everybody that hit pardon had their votes changed to abstain. So there was only one non abstaining vote which got the confirmed psychic executed. I took a screenshot of the votes and some of the chat that happened right afterwards.
I'm hoping that these links turn into actual pictures once i post this. I dont really post screenshots on here often.
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/923669973047312282/6152959360D1F377930AD3993B8C5F44C6F89DD5/
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/923669973047312440/429AC68265E55B3469C18DFE02804C89E66B6A87/
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/923669973047312604/6F0A2C935377EC47F8BA453B82F966A32E0F8116/

item.title: All Pardon votes changed to Abstain
item.dc:creator: CN73DRUMMER
item.description:
What happened?

we put somebody up because he claimed physician but couldn’t be. he explained he meant to write psy (psychic) everybody confirmed his logs and we all mostly pardoned except for one guy. But everybody that hit pardon had their votes changed to abstain. So there was only one non abstaining vote which got the confirmed psychic executed. I took a screenshot of the votes and some of the chat that happened right afterwards.

I’m hoping that these links turn into actual pictures once i post this. I dont really post screenshots on here often.

https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/923669973047312282/6152959360D1F377930AD3993B8C5F44C6F89DD5/

https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/923669973047312440/429AC68265E55B3469C18DFE02804C89E66B6A87/

https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/923669973047312604/6F0A2C935377EC47F8BA453B82F966A32E0F8116/
